params.name: transaction_id
params.description: The ID of the transaction

params.name: message
params.description: Human readable explanation of transaction status

kind.description: The kind of transaction that is desired

amount_expected.description: The amount expected in the payment

amount_out.description: The amount expected to be sent by anchor to user at end of transaction

amount_fee.description: The amount of fee expected to be charged by anchor

quote_id.description: The id returned from a SEP-38 POST /quote response

started_at.description: Start date and time of transaction

updated_at.description: The date and time of transaction reaching the current status

completed_at.description: The date and time of transaction reaching completed or refunded status

transfer_received_at.description: The date and time of receiving transfer

message.description: Human readable explanation of transaction status

refunds.description: An object describing any on or offchain refund associated with this transaction

amount_refunded.description: The total amount refunded in units of amount_in_asset

amount_fee.description: The total amount charged in fees for processing all refund payments, in units of amount_in_asset

payments.description: A list of objects containing information on the individual payments made back as refunds

id.description: The Stellar transaction hash of the transaction that included the refund payment

amount.description: The amount sent back for the payment identified by id, in units of amount_in_asset

fee.description: The amount charged as a fee for processing the refund, in units of amount_in_asset

requested_at.description: The date and time of requesting refund

refunded_at.description: The date and time of making refund
